required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Oral Feeding During Established Labor at Our Institution
clinical_study.official_title: Oral Feeding During Established Labor. Current Practices in the Obstetric Department of the Femme Mère Enfant Hospital (Lyon, France)

brief_summary.textblock: Current French guidelines allow oral intake of clear fluid in women in established labor under epidural analgesia. To date, no study assessed how these guidelines are followed in clinical practice. This study aims to assess the current practices as to the fasting during the labor at our institution, while assessing the experience and the expectations of the parturients (level of comfort or discomfort related to fasting).

primary_outcome.measure: Rate of parturients who declared to have ingested clear fluid during the labor.
primary_outcome.time_frame: The survey will be completed within 2 hours following the delivery

secondary_outcome.measure: Determine the instructions given by health professionals, their spontaneous or non-spontaneous character and the information related to the given fast, according to the parturient
secondary_outcome.time_frame: The survey will be completed within 2 hours following the delivery
secondary_outcome.description: Determine the instructions given by health professionals, whether they are spontaneous or not

secondary_outcome.measure: Specify the type of liquid ingested (water or sweet liquid) and its volume
secondary_outcome.time_frame: The survey will be completed within 2 hours following the delivery
secondary_outcome.description: Nature and volume of liquids ingested

secondary_outcome.measure: Specify the frequency of ingestion of solid foods during labor
secondary_outcome.time_frame: The survey will be completed within 2 hours following the delivery
secondary_outcome.description: Nature and quantity of ingested solids

secondary_outcome.measure: Assess the degree of discomfort associated with thirst that was felt during labor
secondary_outcome.time_frame: The survey will be completed within 2 hours following the delivery
secondary_outcome.description: Degree of discomfort related to thirst on a simple numeric scale (0: no discomfort at 10: very uncomfortable)

secondary_outcome.measure: Assess the degree of discomfort associated with hunger that was felt during labor
secondary_outcome.time_frame: The survey will be completed within 2 hours following the delivery
secondary_outcome.description: Degree of discomfort related to hunger on a simple numeric scale (0: no discomfort at 10: very uncomfortable)

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluate women's satisfaction with the fasting instructions received
secondary_outcome.time_frame: The survey will be completed within 2 hours following the delivery
secondary_outcome.description: Satisfaction with fasting instructions given on a simple numerical scale (0: very high dissatisfaction, 10: maximum satisfaction)

secondary_outcome.measure: Determine if nausea and vomiting are more common in women who have ingested fluids during labor
secondary_outcome.time_frame: The survey will be completed within 2 hours following the delivery
secondary_outcome.description: Incidence of at least one episode of nausea and vomiting during labor

secondary_outcome.measure: Analyze the factors associated with fasting during work and their concordance with the French recommendations on fasting during labor
secondary_outcome.time_frame: The survey will be completed within 2 hours following the delivery
secondary_outcome.description: Analysis of independent risk factors for the patient's strict fasting during labor

secondary_outcome.measure: Indicate the total duration of fast and solid fasting before birth
secondary_outcome.time_frame: The survey will be completed within 2 hours following the delivery
secondary_outcome.description: Total duration of liquid fasting and solids preceding birth

secondary_outcome.measure: Compare fasting instructions received by patients and practices reported by professionals
secondary_outcome.time_frame: The survey will be completed within 2 hours following the delivery
secondary_outcome.description: Fasting instructions received by patients and practices reported by professionals obtained during a practice survey

intervention.intervention_name: Questionnaire to assess of the application of the current French guidelines as to fasting during labor.
intervention.description: Questionnaire focuses on : oral intake of clear fluid during the labor oral intake of solid meal during the labor fasting duration for solid and liquids instruction received as to fasting during labor, nature of these instructions, and who given the instruction (midwife, nurse anesthetist, …) discomfort related to thirst during labor discomfort related to hunger during labor We will also record several medical data as to the course of pregnancy and delivery, analgesia technique, history and characteristics of the parturient.

study_pop.textblock: All adult women who were in labor in our hospital interviewed within 2 hours after vaginal delivery or cesarean section decided during the labor

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- All adult woman who has been in labor in our hospital
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patient refusal
- Elective cesarean section, or emergency cesarean section in a woman not in labor
- Intrauterine fetal death
- Therapeutic abortion
- Patient consent not available (for example, in case of severe post-partum hemorrhage)
